aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the presence of tag key-value pairs in the request

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by the presence of tag keys in the request

ses:apiversion.description: Filters access by the SES API version

ses:feedbackaddress.description: Filters access by the "Return-Path" address, which specifies where bounces and complaints are sent by email feedback forwarding

ses:fromaddress.description: Filters access by the "From" address of a message

ses:fromdisplayname.description: Filters access by the "From" address that is used as the display name of a message

ses:recipients.description: Filters access by the recipient addresses of a message, which include the "To", "CC", and "BCC" addresses

ses:addonsubscriptionarn.description: Filters access by SES Addon Subscription ARN

ses:mailmanageringresspointtype.description: Filters access by SES Mail Manager ingress point type, for example OPEN or AUTH

ses:mailmanagerrulesetarn.description: Filters access by SES Mail Manager rule set ARN

ses:mailmanagertrafficpolicyarn.description: Filters access by SES Mail Manager traffic policy ARN

ses:exportsourcetype.description: Filters access by the export source type
